title: Beautiful Modern Open 1 BR - Capitol Hill Volunteer Park/Broadway
posting_body: I'm renting out my modern (new build) Capitol Hill neighborhood open 1 bedroom, full with all new appliances, brand new floors, 2 minute walk to Volunteer Park and 1 minute walk to Broadway.
The building has two entrances, one private and close to the unit on a side street, and one for the public.
The rooftop has 360 view of the area, including gorgeous views of downtown and the Space Needle.

If you're looking for a beautiful spot at the heart of beautiful Capitol Hill, close to the light rail trains, parks, restaurants, cafes, and several grocery stores, contact me to book a tour of the unit soon!
Incredible rooftop with bbq for events and parties!
The building does not have parking, but plenty of street parking all around.
